name: Reversed (Staber)
description:
a 2D Platfromer made for Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 the theme was Less is More. This was made in a week. The game is short and incomplete, I will be working on it after the game jam!

Music by Z3R0 Controls

A/D  - Move left & Right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Attack

The Reaper was added so I can have something to work with after I am done.

Enjoy :D
